name: Boxer: Arena
description:
Boxer: Arena is a Platformer Fighter! Go head to head against a friend in this chaotic arena.

HOW TO PLAY:

Dash, Slam and use Power Ups against your foe.

Player 1:

WASD - Move

S - Ground Slam

N - Dash (Your main attack)

M - Power Up

Player 2:

Arrow Keys - Move

Down - Ground Slam

Left Click - Dash (Your main attack)

Right Click - Power Up
